sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail has been groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 2, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/1 and 2/2.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The red & blue trails were groomed up nicely after yesterday's snowfall. We skate skied both this morning while the current round of snow was falling which slowed things down a lot.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run survived! (thank you thermodynamics) Tracks are hard and fast.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 lifts, Space Worm and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails continue to be in very good condition and will be packed again this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Welcome to an ideal Northern Michigan ski day. The temperature should climb to around 32 degrees with light wind. A dusting of snow landed on the corduroy this morning and a few more inches are forecast today. Snow surface and grooming are top-notch. Birch Run and JB Arena are closed for the Nordica Winter Rally junior club race. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
